name: LandLordFromHell
description:
The mayor of stingeville has set his eyes on your properties. You have taken out too many loans which you don't intend to repay.

The mayor has backing from the government and will use whatever means necessary to take you down.

The spirits of the forest has come to your aid to prevent the government from tearing down the forest. Make use of what powers the spirits grant you.

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys

Space = shoot

Q,E and R = player abilities

Z, X and C = summon animals.

1,2 and 3 switch weapons.
